## Source: amazon-inspector (2d81307de796f23d50ad12835bc127927e7afbc7c5e5d4fe4948f65ccd413cdd)
The package epicgames-ui was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3621f9844630b24d1526d039d2973fc0c7fc94bcd557eb5f8bf411b591c38728)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'epicgames-ui' @ 291.8.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
